body.p:
Cincinati Ohio May 8th 1861
Govener Magoffin
Dar sir
J. DR. Doxan who is now in Cincinati who is anxious to tobe in Kentucky has a small fine aganst him for some triveal offence, in Campbell co Ky

I Know Doxan well he is a good young man -- is a Nefew of Geo Doxan of your place -- and is anxioes to be at home & I Know many anxious citizens would rejoyce if you would remit the same -- I refer to G, B, Hodge Senator For Ky &c

yours Truly
R T Baker of the Cession of 1850

Refer to Geo B. Hodge
Newport City Ct
Respite 8 mo
B. M
$50
Jno. B Doxan
May 18. 1861
